meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>chess piece</kanji> <kanji>institution</kanji> is where you go to play chess... or, in Japan, it's not chess, it's a <vocabulary>Go hall</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>Go club</vocabulary> (it's a very interesting game you should look it up!).
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
